attributes.action: Stop the off license application for 41 Park Lodge Lane, Eastmoor, Wakefield, West Yorkshire
attributes.additional_details:
We want the goverment to put a stop to X amount of off licenses popping up everywhere.

41 Park Lodge Lane, Eastmoor, Wakefield, West Yorkshire are putting in an application for an off license to operate from 06:00 until midnight............We have other shops/supermarkets within 1 mile of the opposed location, we do not need anymnore.

Bring back the days where you werent aloud to purchase alcohol after a certain time.

In the opposed location there is already alot of anti social behaviour this will only increase if it goes ahead.

We do not want any more unprovoked attacks or murders on our door steps.
We do not want to encourage people to drink all day everyday.

Closing date is 28th Novemebr 2014 we need 7000+ signatures.
